Reviews.Content: i loove it i absolutely loved staying at troppo, the staff are wonderful and entertaining, they are willing to help at all hours of the morning. the hotel is clean and tidy and very pretty, a lot better than some of the others i have stayed at, especially considering how cheap it is! i cannot wait to go back there, i fell in love with bali but mainly the people, the boys behind the bar especially!

Reviews.Content: Troppo Zone not such a big party zone !! Troppo Zone was very pleasent !! i suggest the pool room wing over the superior wing room !! very nice pool scene , although one particular staff member does pester you to buy things which was a big annoyance because it meant we had to avoid the pool area for sometime !!! all hotel staff are very very friendly and the bananna pancakes are AMAZING ! troppo zone isnt the party hotel its marketed at but still a good place for young and old travellers. the rooms are very pleasant !!

Reviews.Author: vickki72

Reviews.Content: Not what it use to be!!! I stayed there with a mate in Oct 2007 for 3 nights. I had stayed at this hotel in the past back in 99 and 2001, both of those times were great, always alot of people to meet at the bar and a good pool bar to come back to after the pub and get a toasty and a few more drinks, no matter what time you got back.This time there was about 5 other people staying in the whole hotel, and they didn't really speak english. It was empty. I went to were the pool bar was and no pool bar!! Just a hole of were it use to be, i'd say they just don't get the people there to buy from it.One night before going out we decided to get a drink from the main bar, we were the only people there, except for the 6 locals working, it felt really strange. The rooms are just like when i was there last time, have not changed 1 bit. They were a bit dirty then and are dirty now, except the bathroom has got alot worse. The only good thing about it was it was cheap!! But it wasn't what me and my mate were looking for, thank god we were booked into the Bounty hotel for a week after that. I hate to be one of these people complaining but i still kind of expected it to be like it was before the bomb, but i suppose alot has changed since then.
Reviews.Author: Farris123
